question: 三百
sourceMnemonic: You have <kanji>three</kanji> <kanji>hundred</kanji>s. What does that come out to? <vocabulary>Three hundred</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading is a little bit weird, so be careful. You should already know the on'yomi readings, but the <ja>ひゃく</ja> rendakus to <ja>びゃく</ja>. This pattern will repeat itself with <ja>三</ja> + many counter kanjis that can rendaku, so pay attention for it as you read Japanese.
